column1: The Purple Pig////Service: The service was pretty disappointing overall. We had a total of THREE servers during our whole meal
column2: none of which were attentive. I was annoyed that we were duped into ordering fancy San pellegrino water when our waiter asked if we wanted "sparkling or tonic water"? I was disappointed to see that inflated price on our bill when it arrived. We were able to order our dishes sporadically
column4: but we didn't see our servers for huge hunks of time.
